author: April RaQuel
quote: A lighter diet, frequent exercise and adequate sleep/rest.

author: Danny Walker
quote: Becoming a great trainer isn’t about learning 10,000 different exercises.

author: Amit Ray
quote: Exercises are like prose, whereas yoga is the poetry of movements.

author: Stan Efferding
quote: I don’t do exercises that hurt.

author: Ganga White
quote: In truth yoga doesn’t take time – it gives time.

author: Jason Crandell
quote: Yoga is the perfect opportunity to be curious about who you are.

author: Bob Harper
quote: Yoga is the fountain of youth. You’re only as young as your spine is flexible.
